title: Health Bar Bug on Champion Health and Tower Health
body: It happened all the time. Though not game changing it does get on my nerves. Sometime when i look at a ally who is low it will show him with full health then he will "take damage" and his health will go back to normal. And by "take damage" i mean i will see there health go down to the actual amount of health they have. It does not change the aspect of the game but it will get on my nerves. I have friends 4 friends on Skype that are experiencing  the same thing so its not just me. Its not a game chaining thing but it happens often enough that it should be fixed.

replies.body: My friends and everyone I play with also sees this.
Do they appear at full health then, when you see them, they appear to take a huge chunk of damage and you see their true health? I think I saw this happen a couple of times today.
Can confirm. Its happening to me when i dont see the champion take dmg and then change my view to him.
